jv.objectGui

Class PsScanline

  • java.lang.Object
    • jv.objectGui.PsScanline

  • public class PsScanline
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class with rasterization algorithms on pixel images.
    Since:
    JavaView 2.80.001

    • Field Summary

      int[] m_xe
      X-coordinates of scanlines. xa: head, xe: tail, both inclusive.
      int m_ymin
      Y-coordinate of first scanlines, next scanlines are m_ymin+1 etc.

    • Field Detail

      • m_xa

        public int[] m_xa
        X-coordinates of scanlines. xa: head, xe: tail, both inclusive. xa[i] is the beginning of i-th scanline from top.

      • m_xe

        public int[] m_xe
        X-coordinates of scanlines. xa: head, xe: tail, both inclusive. xa[i] is the beginning of i-th scanline from top.

      • m_aAnteile

        public float[][] m_aAnteile
        float[3][>=#scanlines]. Barycentric coordinates of heads of scanlines, e.g. for interpolation of scalar values at vertices.

      • m_eAnteile

        public float[][] m_eAnteile
        float[3][>=#scanlines]. Barycentric coordinates of heads of scanlines, e.g. for interpolation of scalar values at vertices.

      • m_length

        public int m_length
        Number of scanlines.

      • m_ymin

        public int m_ymin
        Y-coordinate of first scanlines, next scanlines are m_ymin+1 etc.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PsScanline

        public PsScanline()

    • Method Detail

      • makeScanlines

        public void makeScanlines(int x0,
                 int y0,
                 int x1,
                 int y1,
                 int x2,
                 int y2)
        A triangle in pixel space is digitized in a set of horizontal scanlines. The computed end points of all scanlines are assigned to this raster object.
        Parameters:
        x0 - x-pixel coordinate of first vertex of a triangle.
        y0 - y-pixel coordinate of first vertex of a triangle.
        x1 - x-pixel coordinate of second vertex of a triangle.
        y1 - y-pixel coordinate of second vertex of a triangle.
        x2 - x-pixel coordinate of third vertex of a triangle.
        y2 - y-pixel coordinate of third vertex of a triangle.
        Since:
        JavaView 2.48.005
